|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;STM32F100C8;onchip; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16HG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 8 KiB |ram2chip = STMicro;STM32F100C8;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 4

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B00R49FDB6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 98DX3055 Multi-Layer Managed :Switch Controller w/ Embedded ARM v5 @500MHz *Co-processor: [[STMicro]] [https://www.st.com/en/microcontrollers-microprocessors/stm32f100c8.html STM32F100C8] ARM Cortex-M3 to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR2) *LAN: 4x Gigabit (RJ45) 802.3at PoE Ethernet ports, : 20x Gigabit (RJ45) 802.3af PoE Ethernet ports, :4x GbE SFP slots, :56Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 802.3at (PoE+), 185W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:TPE-2840WS d01 2.png </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS V1.0R Internal.jpeg|PCB, PSU File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS V1.0R Main.jpeg|Main board File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS V1.0R PoE.jpeg|PoE board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
